titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Lionel Hampton should be honored for his contributions to American music.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities.

bill.summary:
4/16/2007--Introduced.
Expresses the sense of Congress that Lionel Hampton should be honored for his contributions to American music and for his work as an ambassador of goodwill and democracy.
